name: logLevel
shortDescription: Gets or sets the current log level.
description: This method gets or sets the current log level.

parameters.name: level
parameters.description:
The log level to set. Valid values are:
  • 0: Log nothing
  • 1: Critical
  • 2: Error
  • 3: Warning
  • 4: Info
  • 5: Debug
Don't use "debug" for normal operation as it slows down Homegear.

returnValue: Returns the current log level as integer
